website_summaries.verdict: Considering its low price point, this softball helmet has a very durable shell.
pros: Layout of the padding inside the helmet delivers a high level of impact protection
Fits the majority of softball players tightly
Helmet doesn’t weigh very much, so it will be comfortable to wear
Contains more than a dozen vent holes to promote airflow inside the material
More than two dozen color options
cons: Foam inside the helmet may pop loose after a while, causing an inconsistent fit

customer_reviews.title: Great Softball Helmet
customer_reviews.text: This is a great helmet. Bought it for my 7 year old for her first year fast pitch softball, along with the face mask. I love how there are many sizes which allows for a more custom fit. Trying on standard helmets, my very tall 7 yo was too big for youth size, yet the adult was way too loose. I got the small which is perfect for her with a some room to grow and little wobble. Her teammates are jealous of her purple helmet with pink face mask!
customer_reviews.author: MDK

customer_reviews.title: Would definitely recommend for 5-7 year olds playing teeball/softball
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this helmet for my 6 year old playing tee ball. She loves that it stands out, and it fits her head snugly. I feel confident knowing she is safer while wearing it, and she loves the color. Would definitely recommend for 5-7 year olds playing teeball/softball. We ordered size small.
customer_reviews.author: Kota11

customer_reviews.title: Restricts field of vision for Tball aged player
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 4 year old for Tball. The helmet did it's job but it really restricts the field of vision. He had to run with his head tilted back (no, the helmet was not too big). Great quality helmet, just didn't fit the little guy well.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Goodwin

customer_reviews.title: Wear a softball helmet
customer_reviews.text: It is good for you to wear the softball helmet because if you don't wear the softball helmet you might get hurt . (so you should wear the softball helmet .) (If you are playing soft ball then you should wear the softball helmet .)
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: Very nice quality
customer_reviews.text: No complaints but does not have a large enough space for pony tail holder like was mentioned in questions. Also, chin strap sold separately. (That’s in the description though)
customer_reviews.author: kirsten connor

customer_reviews.title: Nice Helmet
customer_reviews.text: Very nice helmet, does what it meant to do. Inside foam seems to come off more easily than the other brands I've used in the past...but my teams loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: Love this brand in helmets!
customer_reviews.text: Nice helmet, make sure to measure your kiddo's head. this was too big for mine, but true to the manufacturers sizing.I assumed Large would fit but small was my 11 yo's correct size.
customer_reviews.author: UrbanCountryChica

customer_reviews.title: This fits perfect. And is a pretty pink
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this helmet. We had a hard time finding one that fit her anywhere. This fits perfect. And is a pretty pink.
customer_reviews.author: Jaimie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: I tried to go to a local sporting goods store for a T-ball helmet and they were either to small or to big, and couldn't order the size I needed. This one not only fit perfectly, was her favorite color, but also I was able to buy a chin strap and it not move a single bit. Was not heavy at all, and she was visible from wherever we sat.
customer_reviews.author: Nichole Barton

customer_reviews.title: Nice helmet
customer_reviews.text: My son loves his helmet, he is 4 and the xxs fits nice. Orange is his favorite color so for this helmet to have multiple colors available is amazing. Highly recommend this helmet for any child of any age.
customer_reviews.author: chuck

customer_reviews.title: Really nice helmet.
customer_reviews.text: Really nice helmet, Schutt has put themselves on the softball map by bringing the same quality used in their football helmets. I can see why many teams are going to these.
customer_reviews.author: Keith A. Pittman

customer_reviews.title: Great helmet
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality helmet!! Only down fall, doesn’t fit well on 7 year old head when she has a high ponytail.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine

customer_reviews.title: Great softball helmet.
customer_reviews.text: Size fit perfectly for the measurements we got. Feels great on and is breathable. Haven’t needed to test the actual protection aspect and don’t plan to but great looking helmet.
customer_reviews.author: J. Alonso

customer_reviews.title: Not in good shape! Poor service.
customer_reviews.text: Update: the replacement was shipped and was 2 sizes too small. I have returned both, still no refund. The foam protection around ears either came unglued during transport or was shipped like that. This makes the helmet unusable. The adhesive is firmly adhered to the plastic bag that the helmet was shipped in.
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: High quality helmet and really a great price for the quality of the product
customer_reviews.text: Fit my 8-year old's head perfectly. High quality helmet and really a great price for the quality of the product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer in Michigan

customer_reviews.title: Purchased this for my 4-soon to be 5-year old daughter ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my 4-soon to be 5-year old daughter. It fits her and we used it all T-Ball season. She loves the color.
customer_reviews.author: ALB

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice and has a lot of vents to let the ...
customer_reviews.text: Fits a little bit too snug but it's prolly just my head. Looks nice and has a lot of vents to let the hot air out and cool air in.
customer_reviews.author: Makivante

customer_reviews.title: Great fit. but always get ur kids fitted for ...
customer_reviews.text: Great fit. but always get ur kids fitted for right head size for helmet at ur local sports store then order on amazon
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for my 4 yr old who just started playing tee ball. She has a normal size head and fits her great, it not loose at all
customer_reviews.author: Valerie

customer_reviews.title: Good helmet for 7 year old
customer_reviews.text: Fits great and my daughter loves the bright pink color!
customer_reviews.author: Newmom

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: I'm glad that the helmet got here but I'm disgusted with how they packaged it. Plastic bag over helmet, which is fine but the plastic stuck to the adhesive and now the foam is loose and won't stick to the inside of the helmet.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Great for TBall
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 4 year old for tball, and he’s used it all season and it has held up very well.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit; great protection for my 4 year old little boy!!!
customer_reviews.author: CandyCb

customer_reviews.title: Great helmet!
customer_reviews.text: This helmet is an awesome color and fits great. There is lots of padding inside and stays put. My daughter doesn't have to constantly push it back up on her head when she runs.
customer_reviews.author: K. Hupp

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Softball
customer_reviews.text: Just as described. The Schutt Sports AiR Lite mask fits with this perfectly. Love the variety of colors to choose from.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Awesome helmet!!!
customer_reviews.text: Daughter loves it!! Bought this and the face shield together. The fit is snug without movement but no complaints about hurting her head!!
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Lou

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My son love the helmet and color a perfect fit.
customer_reviews.author: Aisha Ireri

customer_reviews.title: Unfitting
customer_reviews.text: I sent a notification that I needed to return this and return label was never emailed to me ? This product did not fit
customer_reviews.author: d

customer_reviews.title: as expected
customer_reviews.text: perfect, light and looks great with Team logo, No issues, with coordinating Facemask fitment or chin strap.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Fishe

customer_reviews.title: Way better
customer_reviews.text: Not as advertised. Looks shinier in picture it's ok. I returned it for Matt. Way better looking
customer_reviews.author: Dulce Gutierrez

customer_reviews.title: Too big but looks great!
customer_reviews.text: Looks awesome! But my son is 3 and plays t-ball and this xxsmall is quite big. Pads are definitely needed. But he will be able to use f9r a couple yrs
customer_reviews.author: Melinda Rowland

customer_reviews.title: All scratched up.
customer_reviews.text: Helmet came all scuffed and scratched up. Did not return due to needing for game.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Wheeler

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: Awesome helmet I just wish there was a c flap made specifically for
customer_reviews.author: Adam Trevino

customer_reviews.title: Fits great. Looks great
customer_reviews.text: Grand daughter loves this helmet. Fits great. Looks great. Inside padding excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Robert E. Foster

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: Perfect color and fit with all the padding to keep the head safe. Price is very reasonable as well!
customer_reviews.author: Dbschaf10

customer_reviews.title: It fit the little guy just fine I go to special olympics for the children my ...
customer_reviews.text: It fit the little guy just fine I go to special olympics for the children my granddaughter has down syndrome all these children are very special
customer_reviews.author: wanda johnson

customer_reviews.title: The helmet is the great quality as reviewed
customer_reviews.text: The helmet is the great quality as reviewed. It came as promised. However, it's a baseball helmet not softball, as ordered. I double and triple checked that it was a SOFTBALL helmet as my daughter wears a ponytail and needs the relief provided by a softball helmet. Season is in full swing. Helmet was a last minute purchase, therefore I have absolutely no time to send it back. The beauty of mail order.
customer_reviews.author: Danny W Harris

customer_reviews.title: Looks good
customer_reviews.text: Looks good and Fits perfect. Got an XS for my 4 yr old for Tball.
customer_reviews.author: sdmh_28

product_meta.title: Schutt Sports AiR 5.6 Softball Batter's Helmet
product_meta.description: Schutt's newest fitted batter's helmet featuring D30 cushioning. This helmet utilizes D30 impact protection, which creates a soft and flexible shock absorbing material. The Air XE shell is the boldest helmet design on the field. It is made from solid ABS plastic, which helps to make this helmet fit comfortable.
feature_bullets: The AiR 5.6 utilizes the AiR–XE shell, a dynamic shell design that's engineered for a truer fit and maximum ventilation
Built for performance and protection, this helmet features a uniquely engineered and patented polymer that is superior to foam padding
D3O Aero impact foam absorbs and locks together to disperse impact energy and reduce the force transmitted

Featuring the same impact absorption technologies as our football helmets, Schutt batter’s helmets are the fastest growing helmets on the field and made to be the best helmets for America's best teams right here in the USA
